param.name: param.profile
param.spec: text description='Gentoo Profile' label='Profile' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: param.release.type
param.spec: text description='Release Type' label='Type' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: param.target
param.spec: text description='Target Medium' label='Target' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

param.name: param.version
param.spec: text description='Version Stamp' label='Version' validationMode='not_empty' display='prompt'

parameters.param:
WORK_DIR="/var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release.type%/%param.subarch%/%param.target%" BUILD_VER="%param.version%" SNAPSHOT="%param.snapshot%" SUB_ARCH="%param.subarch%" REL_TYPE="%param.release.type%" REL_PROFILE="%param.profile%" REL_SNAPSHOT="%param.snapshot%" SRC_PATH="%param.source.path%"
[[ -d ${WORK_DIR} ]] || mkdir -p ${WORK_DIR} cd ${WORK_DIR}
echo "Cleaning up old hashfiles" for file in "stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum portage-latest.tar.bz2.gpgsig" do rm $file done
echo "Fetching hashes" wget -O stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc || exit 1 wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum || exit 1 wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2.gpgsig || exit 1
[[ -f stage1.spec.template ]] || exit 1
if [[ -f stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(sha512sum stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2|awk '{ print $1 }' ) stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2.DIGESTS.asc &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" else [[ -f stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && echo "Clobbering stagnant stage" && rm stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 FETCH_STAGE=1 fi
if [[ -f portage-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && ( grep $(md5sum portage-latest.tar.bz2) portage-latest.tar.bz2.md5sum &> /dev/null ) then echo "Not fetching, file exists and checksums match" else FETCH_PORTAGE=1 [[ -f portage-latest.tar.bz2 ]] && echo "Clobbering stagnant snapshot" && rm portage-latest.tar.bz2 fi
(( FETCH_STAGE == 1 )) && lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-${BUILD_VER}.tar.bz2 -o stage3-amd64-hardened-latest.tar.bz2 (( FETCH_PORTAGE == 1 )) && lftp -c pget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2
echo sed -e "s/###SUB_ARCH###/${SUB_ARCH}/" -e "s/###VERSION###/${BUILD_VER}/" -e "s/###REL_TYPE###/${REL_TYPE}/" -e "s/###REL_PROFILE###/${REL_PROFILE}/" -e "s/###REL_SNAPSHOT###/${SNAPSHOT}/" -e "s/###SRC_PATH###/${SRC_PATH}/" stage1.spec.template > stage1.spec
echo sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -s ${SNAPSHOT} echo sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -f stage1.spec

BUILD='%param.builid%'
[[ -d /var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release% ]] || mkdir -p /var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release% cd /var/data/catalyst/builds/%param.release%
[[ -f stage2.spec ]] || wget -O stage2.spec "https://gitweb.gentoo.org/proj/releng.git/plain/releases/weekly/specs/amd64/livecd-stage2.spec"
sudo /usr/bin/catalyst -f stage2.spec

[[ -d /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% ]] || mkdir -p /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% cd /var/tmp/catalyst/builds/%Release% wget http://distfiles.gentoo.org/releases/amd64/autobuilds/current-stage3-amd64-hardened/stage3-amd64-hardened-20151210.tar.bz2 wget -O portage-latest.tar.bz2 http://distfiles.gentoo.org/snapshots/portage-latest.tar.bz2 wget https://gitweb.gentoo.org/proj/releng.git/tree/releases/weekly/specs/amd64/livecd-stage1.spec #sudo catalyst -s "$(date +%Y).$(date +%m).$(date +%d)"
